adsmart module

adsmart.generate_advertisement(product_service_name, keywords, length='medium', organization_name='0')[source]

Generates advertisement prompts for a given product or service.

Args:

product_service_name (str): The name of the product or service. keywords (str): Keywords to include in the advertisement prompts. length (str, optional): The desired length of the prompts. Can be “short”, “medium”, or “long”. Defaults to “medium”. organization_name (str, optional): The name of the organization. Defaults to “0”.

Returns:

tuple: A tuple containing a list of generated advertisement prompts and a list of corresponding tones.
